snippet: Scatter a mixture of course breadcrumbs and Parmesan cheese over roasted asparagus and run it under the broiler until it's brown and crisp.
abstract: Scatter a mixture of course breadcrumbs and Parmesan cheese over roasted asparagus and run it under the broiler until it's brown and crisp.

headline.main: The Minimalist: Roasted Asparagus With Crunchy Parmesan Topping
